descripcion: I started learning python six months ago. Currently I have really basic knowledge (attributes, syntax, classes and methods). Also I have worked with python libraries to implement websockets.

Java was the firt programming language that I learned. Because of that, I have quite a lot of experience working with java. I've helped developing Jax-RS web services, simple java applications, and even a client server communication demo with encryption.
I have basic knowledge about html elements and structures. Also, I understand the dom, and many of the classes that HTML provides. This is a language I'd like to keep working on in the future.
Currently, I have a basic knowledge about javascript and Jquery. However, i'm working to improve my abilities with this programming language.
I have experience with SQL queries and sentences. I understand the sintaxis completely and is one the languages that I know best.
